content.rendered:
These are exciting times at the University of La Verne. Our campus is transforming, our regional programs are expanding, our students are engaged in their communities, and we have a strong vision for the future. This growth would not be possible without your help. Your gifts provide essential support for everything from scholarships and lab equipment to fostering faculty excellence and building construction. Your donation, whatever the size, enables the University of La Verne to do more for its students.

On this website, you will find the information you need to become a partner in shaping the university’s future together.

 

Launch Experience
